channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Various potholes near to 40/41 Whittington Road., 25th March
item.description:
Various potholes near to 40/41 Whittington Road have previsously been reported by others back in February, and showing as "Fixed" including report 7104323. However several large potholes remain at this location. please advise when they will be fixed?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light blocked by overgrown vegetation, 25th March
item.description:
Watts Close. This is encouraging anti-social behaviour as the street is unlit,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watts Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree on pavement is getting too large, overhanging my property and blocking out almost all light when leaves are out, 25th March
item.description:

item.title: Drain is still not functioning despite being cleared, 25th March
item.description:
The drain is still not working despite recent clear out. this implies there is an issue with the connecting pipe. please can you investigate further. Photo taken on 23/03/2025 when only relatively light rain occurred

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx 40cm pot hole, 25th March
item.description:
